title: Opinion: Opinion | Who Gets The 'Peace Prize' Now, Mr Trump - The Drones Or The Bombers?
summary_full: A president who returned to the White House on the promise of ending 'Forever Wars' - and wanted a Nobel Peace Prize, no less - now presides over the largest American military build-up in the region since the infamous Iraq war.
